purpose: The email announces the availability of Postdoctoral Fellow and Research Fellow positions at the Helsinki Institute for Information Technology (HIIT). It provides details about the duration of the positions, the universities involved, and encourages applications from diverse backgrounds, particularly underrepresented groups. The email also highlights specific research areas of interest and suggests contacting principal investigators before applying.
evidence_sentences: The Helsinki Institute for Information Technology (HIIT) invites applications for Postdoctoral Fellows and Research Fellows.
HIIT offers a HIIT Postdoctoral Fellow position for up to three years.
For more senior candidates, HIIT offers a HIIT Research Fellow position for up to five years.

Aalto University and the University of Helsinki are both committed to fostering an inclusive environment with people from diverse backgrounds, and researchers from underrepresented groups are particularly encouraged to apply.
All excellent researchers in any area of ICT can be considered, but priority is given to candidates who support one (or more) of the HIIT strategic focus areas.
